pr_title: Enhancement/programming exercise/dynamically build build plan links

timeline.message: Expose build plan link template in info endpoint

Don't use hardcoded build plan URL in client

Use dynamic URL provided by profile service
Add build plan link directive
Add client test for build plan link directive

timeline.bodyText: This looks really really complicated. Can we not achieve this in an easier way?
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: I moved the code to a new directive build-plan-button.directive.ts, so that the components only have to provide the projectKey and buildPlanId.
replies.author: ungaralex

timeline.bodyText: this is quite some duplicated code (see below)
timeline.author: krusche

timeline.message: Add build-plan-button.directive in order to reduce code duplication
